contact.optional_phone_label: Phone number for updates and exclusive offers.

order_summary.gift_card_and_discount_placeholder: Gift card or discount code, 1 code per order

shipping.shipping_method_notice:
Shipping times do not include production time. Please allow 5-7 business days for production of your order.

Rates do not include duties and taxes for international orders. Customs fees and any taxes associated with your purchases are the sole responsibility of the customer and are not factored into the price at purchase.

Shipping Disclaimer: Due to multiple issues we have encountered shipping international orders via USPS, we highly advise that you upgrade your shipping to Fed Ex to ensure a timely delivery.

marketing.accept_marketing_checkbox_label: Keep me up to date on news and offers via email
